movies.title: B.D. in alert
movies.plot: During the 1970s Romania three petty inept criminals are released from jail. Upon their release from jail the three friends, Gogu, Trandafir and Patraulea vow to become law-abiding citizens and to seek jobs. They also consider their top-priority to find wives and get married. At the same time a local team of cops led by Major Dobrescu and Captain Panait investigate a case of money counterfeiting. The three paroled cons accidentally get hold of and use some of the counterfeit bills without knowing that the money is fake. The investigating police team suspects that these three paroled ex-cons are somehow involved. To make matters worse the three young pretty girls that our three friends have recently met and have been dating are, in fact, three con women. The girls belong to a burglary gang and they pose as available single women in order to find rich naive men who could be potential burglary victims. Therefore, Gogu, Trandafir and Patraulea unwittingly are walking into two traps at the...
movies.simplePlot: In 1971 three inept petty Romanian criminals are released from prison but find themselves at the core of two money laundering and burglary cases.

biography.bio: Toma Caragiu was one of the best Romanian actors, playing either comedy or drama, but having a special attraction to the comic movies. He tragically died during the earthquake in Bucharest in 1977, being trapped under the remains of the block of flats he lived in, which collapsed. His body was found days later. An unexpected death for the man who always succeeded to make the oppressed Romanians in Ceausescu's communist era laugh.
biography.name: Toma Caragiu

biography.bio: Dem Radulescu was born on September 30, 1931 in Râmnicu-Vâlcea, Vâlcea, Romania as Dumitru R. Radulescu. He was an actor, known for B.D. in alert (1971), B.D. in the mountains and on the seaside (1971) and Asta-seara dansam in familie (1972). He died on September 17, 2000 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Dem Radulescu

biography.bio: Sebastian Papaiani was born on August 25, 1936 in Pitesti, Arges, Romania. He was an actor, known for Brigada Diverse intrã în actiune (1970), Pacala (1974) and B.D. in alert (1971). He was married to Eugenia Giurgiu-Papaiani. He died on September 27, 2016 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Sebastian Papaiani

biography.bio: Puiu Calinescu was born on June 21, 1920 in Bucharest, Romania. He was an actor and writer, known for Brigada Diverse intrã în actiune (1970), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and B.D. in alert (1971). He died on May 16, 1997 in Bucharest.
biography.name: Puiu Calinescu

biography.placeOfBirth: Vadul Rosu, Soroca county, Romania [now Republic of Moldova]
biography.bio: Iurie Darie was born on March 14, 1929 in Vadul Rosu, Soroca county, Romania. He was an actor, known for Rautaciosul adolescent (1969), Dragoste la zero grade (1964) and B.D. in alert (1971). He was married to Anca Pandrea. He died on November 9, 2012 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Iurie Darie

biography.bio: Jean Constantin was born on August 21, 1928 in Techirghiol, Constanta County, Romania. He was an actor, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), Duelul (1981) and Toate pînzele sus (1976). He died on May 26, 2010 in Constanta, Romania.
biography.name: Jean Constantin

biography.bio: Dumitru Furdui was born on October 27, 1936 in Bailesti, Dolj, Romania. He was an actor and writer, known for Mina Tannenbaum (1994), B.D. in alert (1971) and Toamna bobocilor (1975). He died on April 13, 1998 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Dumitru Furdui

biography.bio: Ion Besoiu was born on March 11, 1931 in Sibiu, Sibiu, Romania. He was an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Bucharest Non Stop (2015) and Toate pînzele sus (1976). He died on January 18, 2017 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ion Besoiu

biography.bio: Vasilica Tastaman was born on October 6, 1933 in Braila, Braila, Romania. She was an actress, known for Asta-seara dansam in familie (1972), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and Comedie fantastica (1975). She died on March 30, 2003 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Vasilica Tastaman

biography.bio: Ioana Dragan is an actress, known for B.D. in the mountains and on the seaside (1971), Brigada Diverse intrã în actiune (1970) and B.D. in alert (1971).
biography.name: Ioana Dragan

biography.bio: Réka Nagy was born on November 19, 1941 in Sepsiszentgyörgy (Sfántu Gheorghe) Romania. She is an actress, known for Pistruiatul (1973), B.D. in alert (1971) and B.D. in the mountains and on the seaside (1971).
biography.name: Réka Nagy

biography.bio: Lucia Boga is an actress, known for B.D. in alert (1971), Lust for Gold (1974) and Impuscaturi pe portativ (1968).
biography.name: Lucia Boga

biography.bio: Elena Caragiu is an actress, known for B.D. in alert (1971), K.O. (1968) and Les fêtes galantes (1965).
biography.name: Elena Caragiu

biography.bio: Carmen María Strujac was born in 1949 in Bucuresti, Romania. She is an actress, known for Fiul muntilor (1981), B.D. in alert (1971) and Sãptãmîna nebunilor (1971).
biography.name: Carmen María Strujac

biography.bio: George Mihaita was born on September 23, 1948 in Moreni, Romania. He is an actor and director, known for Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008), Reconstruction (1968) and Palaria (2004). He is married to Delia Seceleanu.
biography.name: George Mihaita
